title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 9978.6 - Inspection
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 9978.6 - Inspection

State Regulations
(a) Annual
statements may be inspected by the public in accordance with these regulations
at the office of the commission every day that the office is open for business, during the hours 9 a.m. through 12 noon and 1 p.m. through 4 p.m. At the
discretion of the statements access officer, the records may also be inspected
at other times and places. (b) The
statements access officer shall delete from public inspection the categories of
value or amount contained in the annual statements or any other item of
information deleted from the statement pursuant to General Municipal Law, section
813(9)(h) or
813(17)(h). (c) The annual statements are not available
for photocopying, photographing, or mechanical duplication in any manner. Handwritten notes may be taken. (d) No annual statement shall be removed from the custody of the
commission. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
9978.6

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
